dct_description_sm: “A. Winter Sculp.” (bottom center). “Tom. I. pag. 72” (top right). Issued in: Methode Pour Apprendre Facilement La Goegraphie / Jacques Robbe. -- Utrecht, 1687. Reissued in 1688. Further editions from The Hague in 1691 and 1704. Reissued in Paris in 1704.
California as an island, unlabeled and with a rounded northern coast. The St. Lawrence seaway is shown extending deep into the continent and splitting into two arms.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
